body:
I agree the examples could be more useful if the example was converted to
an external test, ie, package ssh_test.

Its a pretty straight forward operation, do you feel like taking a crack?
On 1 Feb 2015 16:03, "Einthusan Vigneswaran" <notifications@github.com>
wrote:
